medium: Copper alloy, silver plate, wood, paper
title: Megillah (scroll) with case
marks: inscriptions, in Hebrew, at opening; \'5662\', incis
text: Lent by The Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: cylinder with crank-shaped handle at one end and wood finial at other end; large overall foliate and geometric decorations; double ring at opening
provenance: (M. Shiauri'); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 5/9/88; Gift to the MIA in 2001.
creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
